name: Markaz-E-Adab-O-Science (Centre for Literature, Comparative Religion, Career Guidance and Training)
briefDescription: Entering into the new millenium if we take a critical look on the entire nation in general and at our community in particular, we get a very complex and vague picture of our social scenario. Upon weighing the pros and cons of our daily educational & economical, social & cultural and religious & political aspects we can anticipate a bleak future. On one hand, unprecedented advancements in the field of arts, literature, science, technology, agriculture and industry have transformed the entire world into a technical global village, (leading to considerable increase in the possibility of enhancement in education, employment and international brotherhood),
